param.name: samplefile
param.label: Sample tsv file
param.help: The file contains the samples informations (format: tabular).

param.name: treefile
param.label: Tree file
param.help: The file contains the tree informations (format: Newick - nhx or nwk).

param.name: ranks
param.label: Names of taxonomics levels

tool.help:
.. image:: $PATH_TO_IMAGES/FROGS_logo.png :height: 144 :width: 110
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
What it does
Launch Rmarkdown script to import data from 3 files: biomfile, samplefile, treefile into a `phyloseq <https://joey711.github.io/phyloseq/>`_ object.
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
Inputs/Outputs
.. class:: h3
Input
**OTU biom file**:
The OTU biom file (format `biom1 <http://biom-format.org/documentation/format_versions/biom-1.0.html>`_). This file is the result of FROGS BIOM to std BIOM. The example of biom file:
.. image:: $PATH_TO_IMAGES/biomfile.png :height: 30 :width: 733
**Newick file** (tree.nwk):
Newick file (format `nxh <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newick_format>`_) is the result of FROGS Tree:
.. image:: $PATH_TO_IMAGES/nwk_treefile.png
**Sample file**: The file contains the conditions of experiment with sample ID in the first column:
.. image:: $PATH_TO_IMAGES/phyloseq_samplefile.png :height: 115 :width: 369
.. class:: h3
Output
**Html file** (format `HTML <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML>`_): The summary of phyloseq object.
.. image:: $PATH_TO_IMAGES/phyloseq_import_data_html.png
**Data file** (format rdata): The informations of data in one phyloseq object.
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
**Contact**
Contacts: frogs@inra.fr
Repository: https://github.com/geraldinepascal/FROGS website: http://frogs.toulouse.inra.fr/
Please cite the **FROGS article**: *Escudie F., et al. Bioinformatics, 2018. FROGS: Find, Rapidly, OTUs with Galaxy Solution.*
